messages.body:
Hi Support Team,

I need assistance with this verification error:
> The Business ID number on the submitted documentation doesn't match the Business ID provided during account setup. Please verify and update the Business ID in your account settings, or provide documentation with a matching Business ID number.

I've checked my account settings but I'm not sure where to find the "Business ID provided during account setup" - could you point me to the specific field where this information is stored?

I'm currently stuck on this verification page: https://platform.example.com/settings/verification



Rachel Thompson

Hi Rachel,

Thank you for reaching out about the Business ID verification issue. The "Business ID provided during account setup" refers to the Employer Identification Number (EIN) or equivalent business registration number you entered when creating your seller account.

To locate and update this information:

1. Go to Account Settings
2. Select the "Business Profile" tab
3. Look for the "Tax Information" section
4. You'll find your registered Business ID there

Ensure this number matches the one on your business registration documents. If you need to update it, you can do so in the same section. After updating, you'll need to resubmit your verification documents.

Let me know if you need any clarification or run into other issues.

Best regards,
Daniel
